input_args.passage: '2010 Maine gubernatorial election | The 2010 Maine gubernatorial election took place on November 2, 2010. Incumbent Democratic Governor John Baldacci was term-limited and unable to seek ...'
input_args.claim: 'And from the same source, we understand that he finished ahead of Libby Mitchell because he conceded the race to the winner, Republican Paul LePage, which means he was one of the last remaining contenders.'
